Data collection:

Social Meme does not collect any additional data except the data that the user their self gives to the application, such as username, email, profile picture etc.

Now you can earn badges based on your total earned likes on your profile:
 1st Badge: Total 20K likes
 2nd Badge: Total 35K likes
 3rd Badge: Total 50K likes

Every month the authors of the 3 most liked posts
 on Social Meme will receive the following Trophies as reward.
 The 1st most liked post: Gold Trophy
 The 2nd most liked post: Silver Trophy
 The 3rd most liked post: Bronze Trophy
 The trophies will be awarded every 1st of the month

The purpose of this application is to make people laugh and have a good time in their free time. I make a great effort to maintain this application by paying attention to the smallest detail and listening to the opinion of users. I would appreciate it if you made a donation (of any amount) to help me continue the hard work.
